latestAction.text: On agreeing to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 215 (Roll no. 50). (text: CR H818-823)

title: Establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2025 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2026 through 2034.
ai_summary: Establishing the congressional budget for the U.S. Government for fiscal year 2025 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2026 through 2034. Estimate the appropriate budget levels for the next three fiscal years. Establish the appropriate budgets for the following fiscal years: 2027, 2028, and 2029. Set the appropriate spending levels for each of the next four fiscal years, 2026, 2029, 2030, 2032, 2033, 2034, 2035.
